plot: A young Japanese married couple must deal with a mysterious force that chose to move into their home. How they handle this challenge will not only surprise them, but also alter their lives forever.
title: Ohayo
plot_es: A young Japanese married couple must deal with a mysterious force that chose to move into their home. How they handle this challenge will not only surprise them, but also alter their lives forever.
plot_en: A young Japanese married couple must deal with a mysterious force that chose to move into their home. How they handle this challenge will not only surprise them, but also alter their lives forever.
